entries.title: Banner Ads
entries.text: • App now contains Banner Ads that will dissappear when focus session started.

entries.title: App is Live on Google Play Store
entries.text: • Stay Focused is now officially available for download on the Google Play.

entries.title: Application for Production Access
entries.text:
• Production access is under review. 
 • Stay tuned for updates on the app's availability to a wider audience.

entries.title: Adjustable Screen Brightness
entries.text: • You can now set your preferred Normal and Dim brightness levels in the Settings page.

entries.title: Improved Dimming Behavior
entries.text: • The app now restores brightness more smoothly after inactivity.

entries.title: Screen Dimming
entries.text:
• To help prevent screen burn-in during long sessions, the app now includes automatic screen dimming. 
 • After one minute of inactivity, the screen will gently dim and return to normal brightness once activity is detected.

entries.title: Pause Timer
entries.text:
• You can now pause your focus sessions anytime. 
 • The timer will automatically pause if you leave the app, and you can resume your session by pressing Play when you return.

entries.title: New Cycles Indicator
entries.text:
• The previous indicator seems to confuse some users into thinking it's a swipeable element.
 • It's been replaced with rings to represent the cycle.
 • A normal pomodoro technique applies 4 work–break cycles. That explains the 4 cycles in the application.

entries.title: Experimental Functions
entries.text:
• Good news for closed testing users.The 25 minute for closed testing proved to be unnecessarily long.
 • To solve this issue, I am introducing an experimental section in the **Settings Page**.
 • Enable it to switch the Timer Duration from _minutes_ to _seconds_.

entries.title: Apply Button
entries.text:
• Simple but necessary, the timer now only stops and changes its values in the main page 
only if the user presses the apply button. 
 • No more losing track of current focus progress if you click on the time in the Settings Page.

entries.title: Released Closed Testing ver.0.1.0
entries.text:
• Initial testing phase deployed to limited users.
• Collecting feedback on usability and performance.
